Description.Text: The Grosvenor Hotel is situated in a prime position, just a short walk away from Torre Abbey Gardens and Torquays main seafront. They offer one of the most relaxing environments in the Bay, with the lovely gardens and great views of the sea.

The Grosvenor Hotel originally started life as two Victorian Villas - The Glefinnan & The Roslin Hall. They first started trading as hotels around 110 years ago. The building has striking Victorian architecture and many of the bedrooms still retain their elegant Victorian proportions and features.
Standard Double - Standard Double offers one double bed with basic room amenities.
